issue.title: [CI] Stop using Python 3.6 by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15100](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15100). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are many CI tasks or related which currently default to Python 3.6. We should switch to a more recent version, such as 3.8.
